column1: On [[9 December]] [[1965]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
column2: a letter]] to Miss Jaworski'''.<ref name=CG>{{CG

column1: *'''Subject:''' In the words of [[Wayne G. Hammond
column3: Scull]], Tolkien writes that "''[h]e is not interested in drama and does not want his work dramatized''".<ref name=CG/>

column1: *'''Publication:''' A description of the letter appeared in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide
column2: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]''.
